name: Ivy the Kiwi? Mini
description:
"Where's my mama?!" Ivy is on a search for her mother and she needs your help! Help guide Ivy by stretching the vines and protect her from treacherous terrain and mean animals who stand in her way. She's a bird, but she can't fly, and she's going to need all the help she can get if she's going to find her mother. Will Ivy find her mother?

Also, try out the Multiplayer mode which pits you against other players in a race for the goal! Over 50 stages available and guaranteed to be great fun for the whole family! Guide, protect and launch Ivy all over the stage!
